data.title: Perakende Satış ve Servis – BI Technology
data.text:
TV Finder

The Retail Television tool is designed for two types of users in an consumer electronics store. For sales associates it has a tool to help work with customers to find the TV right for them. For store managers it contains the store’s inventory data as well as the inventory of stores near-by.

Sales Management and Customer Analysis

The Sales Management & Customer Analysis demo is a mobile optimized app for sales managers and individual reps. It is based on the Adventure Works sales demo database, and includes a high level dashboard, product, region, and customer focused analyses, and of course a full set of transaction level detail. It also features a nice…

Retail Store Performance

The Retail Store Performance dashboard ties corporate strategy to store level execution at all levels of the store operations hierarchy. Timely and accurate store performance metrics can be analyzed in the corporate office, in a store, or through a mobile device for traveling store operations and field management.

Retail Product Performance

This application is designed to demonstrate how QlikView can bring visibility to the performance of products sold in your retail stores by letting you explore sales and product productivity, across any number of customer, item, or demographic dimensions, in order to better analyze and react to business trends. This demo also allows you to envision…

Retail Omni-Channel Analytics

The Retail Omni-Channel dashboard breaks down traditional retail silos by combining and visualizing sales, returns, and customer information across all shopping channels; retail store, online store, call center, mobile store, and catalogue. A complete line of sight across all shopping channels allows a retailer to get a better understanding of the customer and their shopping…

Plant Operations

This Plant Operations demo contains the data from a manufacturing company producing wrapping papers. It gives you the ability to analyse various metrics important to the efficient running of a plant/production line. – Scrap – Plant Costs (including labour, material and overheads) – Machine efficiency and production stats – Work order cycle time

Personal Services – Customer Retention

This application is based on Sales Agreements and their attributes to allow for cancellation analysis and customer demographics. QlikView brings these data sets together to allow users to analyze information simultaneously across data sets. Users can also use the combination of metrics from different data sets to gain new insights into correlation.

Order and Inventory Management

This application takes us into the world of a Retail / Wholesale apparel company. In the application we can gain insight on forecasting inventory levels. We can see specific order level details, revenue and margin information as well as products that would be good replacements for backordered inventory. The data in this application mimics inventory…

Flight Delays

The Flight Delays demo utilizes the map extension created by Idevio to illustrate flight delays and trends for seven airlines in the United Kingdom. In order for the downloadable desktop QVW to function properly, you will need to install IdevioMap extension. The extension was created by Idevio for QlikView 10 and later. It can be…

Consumer Goods Sales – Japanese

This application contains consumer goods sales data in Japanese. Going through the application, you will find different ways of utilizing spark lines. It is great to show the trends of each performer and their differences in each trend’s pattern. Using the uniqueness of QlikView, Associative Analysis, you will be able to analyze sales information from…
